SEO.title: Industry Info, News & Tips
SEO.description: Check our blog for the latest updates and news from the world of blockchain, AI, VR, IoT, software and app development.

preview.alt: Application of AR/VR in the construction industry

preview320.alt: Application of AR/VR in the construction industry

data.title: How Can AR/VR Benefit the Construction Industry?
data.baseline: Even though innovation has played a major role in the progress of the construction industry, companies have been slow to adopt new technologies. Can the arrival of augmented and virtual reality buck this trend and, most importantly, what will happen as a result?

data.title: The Role of AR and VR Technologies in Healthcare
data.baseline: Virtual and augmented reality are providing practical solutions to the challenges faced by the healthcare industry. But what does the future have in store for the adoption of these technologies in the medical field?

data.title: How Can AR and VR Technologies Benefit the Tourism Industry?
data.baseline: Tourism is gradually reawakening after COVID-19 and travel leaders are searching for ways to rescue their businesses. Tourism market players have for some time shown an interest in AR and VR.  But what sort of impact are these tools having on the post-pandemic industry?

data.title: What Is WebAR and How Can It Benefit Your Business?
data.baseline: A perfect tool for customer engagement, augmented reality (AR) offers a captivating and immersive experience. WebAR, for its part, raises this interaction to a new level, helping you to extend  your business as never before.

data.title: Do You Need AR/VR in Your Metaverse Project?
data.baseline: The virtual realm of the metaverse has brought more questions than answers. Some experts claim that it’s an extended version of AR/VR while others view it as a completely new concept. So, what is the actual role of AR/VR in the metaverse?

data.title: What Is the Impact of AR and VR on the Gaming Industry?
data.baseline: To better understand the growth potential of augmented reality and virtual reality in the context of the global games market, it’s good to start with a clearer picture of the size and scope of the industry as a whole.

preview320.alt: People interacting with each other using a VR headset

data.title: How Virtual Reality is Revamping Real Estate
data.baseline: Augmented Reality and Virtual Reality are playing a progressive role in modernizing the marketing and sales landscape of the real estate industry. While technology alone cannot sell homes or furniture, it’s certainly leading to quicker property transactions and enhancing customer experience.

preview320.alt: Two people operating a smartboard wearing AR/VR headsets

data.title: VR/AR in Education and Training
data.baseline: With information now so readily available thanks to powerful search engines, a new wave of education tools - virtual and augmented reality in particular - are putting a greater emphasis on student engagement, learning by doing, and a broader understanding of complex subjects.
